name: TELL-ALL
description:
Ayo, Rath here! Now, I’ve got people coming up to me all the time, asking me the big questions like “what the fuck is wrong with you” and “who are you, again?” And, well, you deserve to know the truth!

We’re gonna get into it all. Questions of life, love, gender, sexuality, identity, philosophy, religion. Gonna lay it all bare, motherfuckers. We’re gonna answer questions you didn’t even think to ask, and then we’re gonna answer the followups to those.

I’ve been holding my cards close to my chest for a while, but honestly writing this all out has been a pretty massive relief. Well, without further ado, let’s get into it! Hope you enjoy.
